name: Pew-Pew Land
description:
You are armed and hostile creatures are wandering around the green meadow, ready to open fire on you or at least bite. Will you be able to reach the end by destroying them all to the last...

Pew-Pew Land is a fast-paced platform shooter where you take on the role of the protagonist and destroy demonic creatures. There are several types of weapons available in the game. The lingering levels are filled with enemies and platforms of various tactics. Shoot the enemy and complete the level

Game Features:
- Dynamic gameplay
- Lots of shooting
- Pleasing to the eye graphics
